articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: tSquare2D
description: The `tSquare2D` object tests if a given 2D mass position falls within a defined square region. It receives the mass's X and Y coordinates and outputs 1 if the mass is inside the square, and 0 otherwise. The square region is defined by its minimum and maximum X and Y coordinates.
